value:
Whoa! Hilda and the professor are in
this world too?! You better not have
summoned the debt collectors...

I racked up some debt and made a
habit of attracting bounty hunters.
That's how I ended up in Abyss.

Yuri, Constance, and Hapi all have
their quirks, but they're not bad
people. I bet you'll get along just fine.

Don't think I look like a noble? I get
that, but you're looking at the head of
a minor noble house of the Alliance!

We all have to decide where we
belong and then fight for it. Can't let
your wallet control your fate.

Let me hide out here for a little while.
Don't ask why! Just do it as a favor
for your pal $Nf!
It's good to be king.
Fresh out of luck.

Heh. Can't seem to find my
footing today...

Thanks! My arms are throbbing from
all that training!

The name's Balthus, heir to House
Albrecht and the Undisputed King of
Grappling. You can count on me!

I finally made it out of life
underground, but now I'm fighting in
another world. It's always something!$k$pI guess leading an adventurous life is
better than a boring one, but...$k$pOn the other hand, I feel like my life
might be a little too adventurous, you
know what I mean?$k$pEither way, there don't seem to be
any debt collectors or bounty hunters
after me, so maybe I can relax a little.$k$pWhile I'm here, I might as well show
you what it means to be the
Indomitable King of Grappling.$k$pI'll make it so our enemies won't
know what hit 'em. Just let me do
things my way and we'll be square.
だっ
うらっ
がはっ
ぬああああああっ
Time to die, pal!
Heh, watch this!
Do-or-die!
Ready to bleed?
I'll get you next time!
Haha
The name's Balthus. Formerly of the Alliance.
Gonna take more than that to get the jump on me, pal.

We all have to decide where we belong and then
fight for it.

Bounty hunters are the worst, yeah?
They can't just let me be.

If they want a fight, let's give 'em one
to remember!
Where do I gotta go to get some gold around here?
You're a busy one, aren't ya? Being a summoner seems like a tough gig.
Yeah.
Over that way?
Let's get to it!
